attributes.action: Stop UK Media from Combining Islam to Terrorism
attributes.additional_details: This epetitions is to stop media from combining Islam to terrorism, this is causing issues such as hate, crime, killing and more. We don't need to lose any more lives because of religion hates that the Media is creating. We need to stop this.

rejection.details: There are current laws against incitement, and of what the media can and cannot say.
